description:
There was a time when few Latin Americans were aware of who Elon Musk was, despite his large fortune.   But this eccentric, unorthodox billionaire — owner of big tech companies such as Tesla, Starlink, and since 2022 even X (at the time, Twitter) — is becoming increasingly famous inside political discussions in the region, especially […]

The post The Musk holiday camp has a new visitor appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
title: The Musk holiday camp has a new visitor
